parameters.name: DebugEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable remote debugging. Valid values:

*   true: enables remote debugging.
*   false: disables remote debugging.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the namespace. The description can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Specifies whether to create or modify the namespace. If this parameter is left empty or is set to 0, the namespace is created. Otherwise, the namespace is modified.

parameters.name: MseInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the MSE registry.

parameters.name: RegionName
parameters.description: The name of the namespace. The name can be up to 63 characters in length.

parameters.name: RegionTag
parameters.description:
The ID of the namespace.

*   The ID of a custom namespace is in the `Region ID:Namespace identifier` format. Example: cn-beijing:tdy218.
*   The ID of the default namespace is in the `region ID` format. Example: cn-beijing.

parameters.name: RegistryType
parameters.description:
The type of the registry.

*   default: the shared registry of Enterprise Distributed Application Service (EDAS)
*   exclusive_mse: a Microservices Engine (MSE) registry
